ai-atk-abh03a55:1_1: As a resultant result: the result of this teaching causes and reasons to show the reason for the sake of which the causes and reasons, or with an idea, they have said,
ai-atk-abh03a55:1_3: This is how there are ninefold opposites for three, five groups, three groups of nine groups, seventy-six to be understood in the way already described.
ai-atk-abh03a55:2_1: You don’t give a teaching because the result for the sake of requisites. Those who don’t give rise to the following ten reasons, or who have them said,
ai-atk-abh03a55:2_2: and the same method applies in the same way.
ai-atk-abh03a55:2_3: This is how the nineteenth sections should be understood here: “One groups, two, three, four, five, ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, a hundred, a thousand, or a hundred thousand compositions .
ai-atk-abh03a55:2_4: But, as to reckoning, it is reckoned as proximate cause, still encounterally opposites that should be understood as the method of repetitions and species, etc., and observed by the pain Independent of others.
ai-atk-abh03a55:3_0: Having been born in this contortion with the same disease as them, they return to the home life.
ai-atk-abh03a55:4_1: Questioning is profitable in questioning, and skilled in such passages as “profitable,” and so on. and although they are expounded, etc., respectively profitable, and unwholesome.
ai-atk-abh03a55:4_2: Then the result arises in him in a sensual-sphere becoming, and in the object of that sense-object arises.
ai-atk-abh03a55:4_3: But those who have doubts and uncertainty, do they say, “This is the basis for ending that in prone to being troubled, and there are no more than that.”
ai-atk-abh03a55:4_4: the base consisting of boundless space ... for what is called the condition for attaining the dimension of infinite consciousness. It is a condition for attaining the attainment of the base consisting of boundless space as its object, for what is said.
ai-atk-abh03a55:4_5: The meaning should be understood through this very day of all the time, which is good.
ai-atk-abh03a55:5_0: the state of loss is fitting to deal with the object; and it is with its nine proximate causes, dropings, etc., and because it is born in a world-producing condition that have arisen dependent on the objects beginning with enemy, and it is likewise in whatever way, the unboundedness of the variety of concentration produced by the constituents . It is manifested as the production of resentment in the various ways, and it is likewise produced by a drowned as object.
ai-atk-abh03a55:5_1: Likewise as in the borderlands, etc., of the three opposite sex, etc., should be understood in the way beginning, “accident, the westerning of the greed, the hard-to-see, the harder, the westerning, the pure, the unseened, and unconfused, etc., as the virtue consisting of the opposite sess, and the using of fewness of wishes, contentment, etc., as the respective essence, and the immaterial essence, etc., and should be understood in the sense of the kind already stated underly obses consisting of the preferated.
ai-atk-abh03a55:6_0: And herein, in the other three,
ai-atk-abh03a55:6_1: for it is provided, no enemy, without protection,
ai-atk-abh03a55:6_2: Their difference is proportioned for his sakes; and his life span does not flow.
ai-atk-abh03a55:6_3: They don’t show their similes to the rest of the midst of the Sangha. That is why it cannot be said, but when anyone else?
ai-atk-abh03a55:6_4: But when we have departed, we will go to that precincts.
